bibl.title: P. Genova II 52: A Link with Hesychius?
bibl.note: Many (though not all) of the words in P. Gen. II, 52 also appear in a completely or almost completely identical form as lemmata in the lexicon of Hesychius. Examines from the same point of view P. Bodmer LI recto and S.B. XII, 10769 [= P. Chester Beatty sans No. d'Inv.].
bibl.seg: WORP Klaas A., P. Genova II 52: A Link with Hesychius?

Many (though not all) of the words in P. Gen. II, 52 also appear in a completely or almost completely identical form as lemmata in the lexicon of Hesychius. Examines from the same point of view P. Bodmer LI recto and S.B. XII, 10769 [= P. Chester Beatty sans No. d'Inv.].
